sample.title: SDES Analysis using Entropy
sample.summary: Cryptanalysis of the SDES algorithm using the KeySearcher component and an entropy function
sample.description: This template shows the cryptanalysis of the SDES algorithm using the KeySearcher component and an entropy function.
sample.keywords: advanced, standard, NIST, Rijndael, Daemen, Rijmen, symmetric, keysearcher, Attack, Analysis
sample.title: SDES Analyse per Entropie
